name: Knowledge Sharing
description:
Use "The Workshop" Workshop board to increase knowledge sharing amongst your team and organization.


Instructions

  1. Anonymously suggest subjects that you’d either like to present a workshop on or that you’d like to learn about.
  2. The team will vote on all suggestions and the most in-demand subjects will be chosen to lead a workshop.
  3. Set a time to have workshops!


Created by the Product Studio team at VICE
